item.description: Hi guys! So we were able to find a more Central location for our meetup! We will be meeting at the Olympia Diner on the Berlin turnpike, and they have a meeting room in the back which is reserved for us. We will continue the conversation regarding our strategy for Ron Paul and Liberty in the Constitution state. For the time being we'll have these regularly on the 1st and 3rd Mondays of the month. Looking forward to continuing the discussion!!
item.name: CT4Paul Social & Organizational Meetup
